summary: Skindiver tries to recover sunken treasure before a group of thieves learn of its existence.
cast: Jon Hall|Nan Adams|John Farrow|Jonathan Haze|Greigh Phillips|Dave 'Howdy' Peters|Tookie Evans|Martin Denny|Bob LaVarre|Bill Anderson|Abraham Kaluna|Kalani Cockett|Pauline Cockett|Barney Isaacs|David Kupele|Terri Rua|Mahi Beamer|Sam Kahalewai|Peter Kupke|Arthur Lyman|Joseja Moe|Randy Oness|Terii Rua
title: Forbidden Island
